TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSinkProvider
Public Class SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider Implements IClientChannelSinkProvider, IClientFormatterSinkProvider

summary.span: 为客户端格式化程序接收器提供程序提供实现。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a client formatter sink provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A创建客户端使用的格式化程序接收器来序列化消息的远程处理从流过的客户端通道的消息。A creates client formatter sinks that use the to serialize messages for the client channel through which remoting messages flow. 格式化程序接收器的作用是生成所需的标头并将消息序列化为流。The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream. 在到达格式化程序接收器后转发到通过该通道接收器链中的所有接收器或调用。After reaching the formatter sink, the is forwarded to all sinks in the channel sink chain through the or calls. 在此阶段消息已序列化，并且仅作为信息提供。At this stage the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only. 需要创建或修改消息的接收器必须放置在之前格式化程序接收器链中。Sinks that need to create or modify the message must be placed in the sink chain before the formatter. 这可以通过实现同时实现和接口。This can be achieved by implementing both the and interfaces. 格式化程序接收器可将该接收器链中更高版本。The formatter sink can be placed in the sink chain later. 格式化程序接收器使用接收器配置属性在运行时配置的通道。Formatter sinks use sink configuration properties to configure the channel at run time. 在配置文件中，或以编程方式内,，可以指定接收器属性。Sink properties can be specified in a configuration file, or programmatically, inside of a . 在配置文件中所有值都表示通过字符串，但生成的属性时其本机值或字符串与以编程方式，可以指定值类型。In a configuration file all values are represented by strings, but when building a property programmatically, value types can be specified with their native values or with strings. 下表显示的接收器可以为当前的接收器提供程序指定的配置属性。The following table shows the sink configuration properties that can be specified for the current sink provider. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式化程序是否将包括版本信息。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值为`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此对象的实例与不受信任的数据或在不安全通道会带来安全风险。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 使用此对象仅与受信任的数据以及跨安全通道。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink CreateSink (System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender channel, string url, object remoteChannelData);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink CreateSink(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender channel, string url, object remoteChannelData) cil managed
Public Function CreateSink (channel As IChannelSender, url As String, remoteChannelData As Object) As IClientChannelSink

public: virtual System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSink ^ CreateSink(System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IChannelSender ^ channel, System::String ^ url, System::Object ^ remoteChannelData);

param.name: channel
param.span: 信道，为其构造此接收器链。

span.span: Channel for which this sink chain is being constructed.

param.name: url
param.span: 要连接到的对象的 URL 或目标对象的信道 URI。

span.span: URL of object to connect to or the channel URI for the target object.

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 描述远程服务器上的信道的信道数据对象。

span.span: A channel data object describing a channel on the remote server.

returns.span: 新生成的信道接收器链中的第一个接收器，或 （指示此提供程序将不会或不能为此终结点提供连接）。

span.span: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or , which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当方法被调用时，它会创建其自己的通道接收器，转发调用链 （如果有） 中的下一步接收器提供程序，并确保下一个接收器和当前链接在一起。When the method is called, it creates its own channel sink, forwards the call to the next sink provider in the chain (if there is one), and ensures that the next sink and the current one are linked together.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSinkProvider ^ Next { System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSinkProvider ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSinkProvider ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置接收器提供程序链中的下一个 。

span.span: Gets or sets the next in the sink provider chain.

value.span: 接收器提供程序链中的下一个 。

span.span: The next in the sink provider chain.
